target.mrk: Gérer les utilisateurs et les droits utilisateur

trans-unit.source: This section explains how to create a profile and to manage users and user rights in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: This section explains how to create a profile and to manage users and user rights in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Cette section explique comment créer un profil, et gérer des utilisateurs et des droits utilisateur dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
